titleStmt.title: The mysticall vvolfe. Set forth in a sermon preached in the Church of Edmond the King, in Lombard-street. / By E.P.
titleStmt.author: Pagitt, Ephraim, 1574 or 5-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Marie Okes, and are to be sold by Robert Trot, at his shop under the Church of Edmond the King,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: the 5 in imprint date is crossed out and altered to 1644; "Feb: 3d".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
